e: 例⃝「`他~`年紀~`輕~`輕~，`就~`有~`此~`優異~`表現~，`真是~`後生可畏~」。
d.f: `有~`作為~、`有~`發展潛力~`的~`年輕~`一代~，`能~`超越~`前輩~，`令~`人~`敬畏~。

francais: Les jeunes inspirent aux vétérans un repect mêlé de crainte
Deutsch: der Nachwuchs überflügelt die ältere Generation  (Sprichw)
English: will be redoubtable in later life (idiom); a young person's abilities must be respected, though inexperienced
the younger generations will surpass us in time
